description:
The war started! Dinosaurs came backâ€¦ and bloodthirsty zombies are even more dangerous! It's about time to find yourself in a new, post-apocalyptic action! The wasteland full of destroyed buildings and dino's nests - it's what the modern battlefield looks like. Be careful and aim the rifle, demanding opponents are waiting for you! 

Key Features:
- EXPLORE VARIOUS MAPS AND LOCATIONS!
- BE MORE DEADLY, UPGRADE YOUR WEAPONS!
- ENJOY NEXT-GEN BULLET-TIME EFFECTS IN EVERY SNIPER HEADSHOT!
- GRAB YOUR GUNS, TONS OF MISSIONS AWAITS!
- MASTER YOUR SHOOTING SKILLS AND SURVIVE THE APOCALYPSE!
- DISCOVER EXOTIC JURASSIC LOCATIONS AND HUNT DINOSAURS!
- FILLED WITH FURY, AIM, SHOOT AND HUNT!

It's about time to take on the role of the fearless modern sniper, go hunting and survive in the world overflowing with wild dinosaurs and bloodthirsty zombies. Join an epic story in exotic Jurassic locations!
name: Best Sniper: Shooting Hunter
